MNKD Well here we sit at 125 Its not what we think of Mgmts missteps it what Wall Street thinks Lets face the reality of this situation This stock has had zero support because of all of the aboveMissed timelinesMGMTs greediness Unable to market a miracle drugLack of creativity in a failed marketing planZero visibilityHrs inability to communicate with shareholdersConstantly kicking the can down the roadWeak sales forceDeals they have made marketing Afrezza have little upfront monies This is why Wall Street has little faith in this puppy and the shorts eat our lunch When I bought this security many years ago I imagined this was a no brainer What I did not anticipate was the total failure of 4 CEOs that felt dilution was the only way to fund this company This stock has the same scenario as DNDN Miracle drug and inept MGMT Yes I owned that one Too

MNKD We all agree that Afrezza is a disruptive technology that can be a major game changer in the diabetes world We also know that 9899 of all diabetics dont know about it Furthermore we know many Endos and physicians wont prescribe Afrezza because they just dont know enough about it are to damn lazy to switch over patience and receive stipends from BP to prescribe their own insulin The same can be said for PBMs and Insurers Ok Mike when you came on board those were the hurdles and we all knew about them so nothing surprising or even unusual for most new drugs not supported by BP WTF are you doing to overcome these issues So far its looking like a major fail with the exception of the UTHR deal How about telling us which insurers and PBM companies cover Afrezza How about the DTC program statistics though they must be weak because 9899 of diabetics dont know about the product Any updates on International and or discussions with possible partners Throw us a bone
